definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: South Gate Village, 424 Yanggui Yun, M, 50-year-old, esophagus.
sentences.chinese: 南门村424号杨桂云，男，50岁左右，食道癌。

sentences.english: The truth is, doing so increases the risk of oesophagus cancer.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，喜欢吃烫食的人更容易患上食道癌。

sentences.english: Tobacco and alcohol are the main factors linked to the development of oesophageal cancers in Europe and America.
sentences.chinese: 在欧美国家，抽烟和喝酒是导致食道癌的主要因素。

sentences.english: A chest computed tomography showed esophageal cancer with pneumopericardium.
sentences.chinese: 其胸部电脑断层片也指出食道癌及心包膜腔积气。

sentences.english: There were lots of tryptase -positive mast cells in the mesenchyme of the human carcinoma tissue of esophagus.
sentences.chinese: 人食道癌间质中可见多量类胰蛋白酶阳性细胞。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of the treatment to esophageal cancer by self-expanding covered stent implanted into esophagus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨自膨式带膜支架置入治疗食道癌的临床意义。

sentences.english: Can esophagus cancer cure after all not?
sentences.chinese: 食道癌到底可以治好不？

sentences.english: What distinction does the symptom with esophagus cancer and phlogistic esophagus have?
sentences.chinese: 食道癌和食道炎的症状有什么区别？

sentences.english: A cancer-causing agent known as N-NMBA (nitrosomethylbenzylamine) is linked with esophageal cancer, Chen says.
sentences.chinese: 神经肌肉阻断剂被认为是一种与食道癌相关的引癌剂。

sentences.english: In addition, the Yang Jinyuan mother contracts carcinoma oesophagi, actually has not drawn up disease certificate.
sentences.chinese: 此外，杨锦元的母亲患食道癌，却没有开具。

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
